pr_title: Added 'last login time' and 'first login time' to get when the player last/first logged in the server

timeline.message: Added 'last login time' and 'first login time' to get when the player last/first logged in the server

timeline.bodyText: This sentence should end with a period.
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.message: Added a . to the end of the description and improved the examples

timeline.bodyText: The last login method requires Paper 1.13 so it may be good to mention it with the RequiredPlugins annotation. Or at least mentioning the behaviour change in the description.
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure as to what getLastPlayed does, as in whether or not it gets when they last joined or when they last left the server
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: In Paper, it was replaced by OfflinePlayer#getLastLogin and OfflinePlayer#getLastSeen, since the behaviour of the method is unclear, my wild guess is that it is the time they were last seen.
replies.author: FranKusmiruk

timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

timeline.bodyText: missing new line at the end
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk
Wealthyturtle

replies.bodyText: super calls setExpr, which he can do himself here but I actually prefer them to call super since we don't know if we are going to add more logic in the future.
replies.author: FranKusmiruk
